recipe_name: Lettuce cups with chilli beef stir-fry
author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat a griddle pan until hot. Drizzle the beef strips in the oil and chilli flakes and fry quickly in the hot griddle pan for 1-2 minutes. Add the spring onions, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and cook for a further minute. To serve, arrange the lettuce leaves on a serving plate and fill with the chilli beef stir-fry.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz fillet steak, cut into strips,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  2 spring onions, finely sliced,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  1 Little Gem lettuce, large leaves only
